definition: to dig one's own grave
self/oneself/from/since/naturally/surely
to dig
grave/tomb/CL:座[zuo4]/embankment/mound/ancient book
grave/tomb/mausoleum

sentences.english: It is suiciding ignorance of the highest order.
sentences.chinese: 这是最无知的自掘坟墓。

sentences.english: I never dug the graves in Talafar.
sentences.chinese: 我不想在塔拉自掘坟墓。

sentences.english: Witnesses said that the prisoners were forced to dig their own trench graves before the slaughter.
sentences.chinese: 目击者说，囚犯们在死前要自掘坟墓。

sentences.english: You are just digging your own grave if you go on smoking so heavily.
sentences.chinese: 你继续这样过度吸烟，就是在自掘坟墓。

sentences.english: Gluttons dig their graves with their teeth.
sentences.chinese: 馋嘴贪食的人，用自己的牙齿自掘坟墓。

definition: to court disaster (idiom)/to dig one's own grave
to follow the path to one's own doom (idiom)/to bring about one's own destruction
to move a stone and stub one's toe/to shoot oneself in the foot (idiom)
pinyin: ban1 shi2 tou5 za2 zi4 ji3 de5 jiao3

definition: to crush one's own foot while trying to maneuver a rock (to a cliff edge, to drop on one's enemy) (idiom)/hoisted by one's own petard
pinyin: ban1 qi3 shi2 tou5 za2 zi4 ji3 de5 jiao3

definition: to ask for trouble (idiom)/to make a rod for one's own back
to play with fire and get burnt (idiom); fig. to play with evil and suffer the consequences/to get one's fingers burnt
to eat one's own fruit (idiom); fig. suffering the consequences of one's own action/to reap what one has sown
to bring trouble on oneself
to spin a cocoon around oneself (idiom); enmeshed in a trap of one's own devising/hoist by his own petard
to show the wolf into the house (idiom)/to introduce a potential source of trouble
disaster one brings on oneself/to be reponsible for something bad that happens to oneself/to have only oneself to blame
to ask for trouble/to invite difficulties
lit. to nurture a tiger invites calamity/fig. to indulge one's enemy is asking for trouble (idiom)
lit. to eat one's own bitter fruit (idiom)/fig. to suffer the consequences of one's own actions/to stew in one's own juice
impossibly stupid
lit. drinking poison in the hope of quenching one's thirst (idiom)/fig. a supposed remedy that only makes matters worse
